name: InfiniRobot
description:
Wanting to have a bit of casual fun? Look no further than your friendly InfiniRobot. That is, until his clumsiness gets the best of him. Made with love from an Intro to Programming for Games class at NYU, this infinite runner will be sure to challenge your chill game sesh.

Controls:

  • Space / Up Arrow - Jump
  • Enter / Click Replay Button - Restart (Only when game is over)
  • Down Arrow - Duck

Gameplay:

  • Jump / duck to avoid obstacles
  • Game speeds up over time
  • Retrieve power up to reduce speed
